transfer.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from the caller to the specified `recipient`.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` on behalf of `sender`.

allowBurn.description: Returns whether burning tokens is allowed.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.

approve.description: Approves `spender` to spend `amount` tokens on behalf of the caller.

checkSignature.description: Checks the validity of `sig` for the given `digest`.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used in the token's representation.

finishedVotings.description: Checks if the votings are finished for a given `bytes32` value.

getFullOracleSet.description: Returns the full list of oracle addresses.

getNewBurnStatusId.description: Returns the identifier for the new burn status using `newBurnStatus` and `nonce`.

getNewSetId.description: Returns the identifier for a new oracle set using `oracleSetHash` and `set`.

getSwapDataId.description: Returns the identifier for swap data using `data`.

isOracle.description: Checks if an address is an oracle.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

oraclesSet.description: Returns the oracle set for a given `uint256` value.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

voteForMinting.description: Submits a vote for minting using `data` and `signatures`.

voteForNewOracleSet.description: Submits a vote for a new oracle set using `oracleSetHash`, `newOracles`, and `signatures`.

voteForSwitchBurn.description: Submits a vote for switching the burn status using `newBurnStatus`, `nonce`, and `signatures`.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a `spender` by `owner`.

NewOracleSet.description: Emitted when a new set of oracles is created.

SwapEthToTon.description: Emitted when ETH is swapped to TON.

SwapTonToEth.description: Emitted when TON is swapped to ETH.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from `from` to `to`.
